response.overview: "Legacy of the First" is a 10-minute documentary that tells the story of the First United Building in Escolta, Manila, an iconic art deco structure brought to prominence by the collective efforts of building owners, creatives, and the local community. Through interviews, the film reveals how this collaboration preserved the building's rich heritage, transforming it into a vibrant cultural hub. The story reaches its peak during the COVID-19 pandemic, when many businesses faced closure, but the unwavering support of the building's owners helped them endure, showcasing the resilience of a united community. This documentary is a tribute to the people whose dedication proves that heritage and culture can thrive through collective passion and action.
response.title: Legacy of the First
